title: Hot glass
creator_credit: John Tchalenko and National Film School (Great Britain)
brief_description: Several expert glass makers demonstrate their skills and techniques. Includes Simon Pearce, Fred Daden, Wilki Adolpson, Dale Chihuly, Jamie Carpenter and Gianni Toss.
